Question.Subject: Has eBay gotten slower in recent months than they used to be?
Question.Content:
I've been a frequent eBayer since 2000, and I must say that in recent months, and even more so in recent weeks, it has gotten so slow and unresponsive so as to be nearly unusable! Am I the only one who's noticed this?
I'm on a broadband connection, and no other sites are slow for me. What say you guys?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I haven't noticed anything with the speed of ebay I've used ebay for three years now & haven't noticed any difference.

Answer.Content: I haven't noticed anything with the speed of ebay I've used ebay for three years now & haven't noticed any difference.
